verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

If a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w commit|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w lie|strong="H3584"\w* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w* in that which was \w delivered|strong="H6487"\w* him to keep, or in \w fellowship|strong="H8667"\w*, or in a thing taken away by \w violence|strong="H1498"\w*, or hath \w deceived|strong="H6231"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*;\f + \fr 6.2 \ft in fellowship: or, in dealing\f*\f + \fr 6.2 \ft fellowship: Heb. putting of the hand\f*

Or have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* that which was \w lost|strong="H0009"\w*, and \w lieth|strong="H3584"\w* concerning it, and \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*; in \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of all these that a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w*, \w sinning|strong="H2398"\w* \w therein|strong="H2007"\w*:

Then it shall be, because he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and is \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*, that he shall \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H1500"\w* which he took violently \w away|strong="H1497"\w*, or the \w thing|strong="H6233"\w* which he hath deceitfully \w gotten|strong="H6231"\w*, or that which was \w delivered|strong="H6487"\w* him to \w keep|strong="H6485"\w*, or the lost \w thing|strong="H0009"\w* which he \w found|strong="H4672"\w*,

Or all that about which he hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*; he shall even \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* it in the \w principal|strong="H7218"\w*, and shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* the fifth \w part|strong="H2549"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* thereto, \add and\add* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his trespass \w offering|strong="H0819"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft in the day…: or, in the day of his being found guilty: Heb. in the day of his trespass\f*

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, with thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him for any \w thing|strong="H0259"\w* of all that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in \w trespassing|strong="H0819"\w* therein.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*: It \add is\add* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, because of the \w burning|strong="H4169"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w* unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w burning|strong="H3344"\w* in it.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft because…: or, for the burning\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w put|strong="H3847"\w* on his \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w garment|strong="H4055"\w*, and his \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w breeches|strong="H4370"\w* shall he \w put|strong="H3847"\w* upon his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and take \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* which the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* with the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and he shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall put \w off|strong="H6584"\w* his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* unto a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w burning|strong="H3344"\w* in it; it shall not be put \w out|strong="H3518"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* on it every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and lay the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* upon it; and he shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* thereon the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.
The \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* be \w burning|strong="H3344"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; it shall never go \w out|strong="H3518"\w*.

¶ And this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall \w take|strong="H7311"\w* of it his \w handful|strong="H7062"\w*, of the \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* thereof, and all the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* which \add is\add* upon the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, \add even\add* the \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* of it, unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w remainder|strong="H3498"\w* thereof shall \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: with unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* shall it be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.

It shall not be \w baken|strong="H0644"\w* with \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*. I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it \add unto them for\add* their \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of my offerings made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*; it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, as \add is\add* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and as the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*.

All the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of it. \add It shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* concerning the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*: every one that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* them shall be \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

This \add is\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, which they shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when he is \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w*; the tenth \w part|strong="H6224"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w*, \w half|strong="H4276"\w* of it in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w half|strong="H4276"\w* thereof at \w night|strong="H6153"\w*.

In a \w pan|strong="H4227"\w* it shall be \w made|strong="H6213"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; \add and when it is\add* \w baken|strong="H7246"\w*, thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it in: \add and\add* the \w baken|strong="H8601"\w* \w pieces|strong="H6595"\w* of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that is \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* in his stead shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* it: \add it is\add* a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; it shall be \w wholly|strong="H3632"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w*.
For every meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* for the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall be wholly \w burnt|strong="H3632"\w*: it shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*: In the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* is \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* shall the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* be \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

The \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that offereth it for \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it: in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* shall it be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

Whatsoever shall \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* thereof shall be \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*: and when there is \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof upon any \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, thou shalt \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* that whereon it was \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

But the \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* wherein it is \w sodden|strong="H1310"\w* shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*: and if it be \w sodden|strong="H1310"\w* in a \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w pot|strong="H3627"\w*, it shall be both \w scoured|strong="H4838"\w*, and \w rinsed|strong="H7857"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
All the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* among the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And no sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, whereof \add any\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* is \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* to \w reconcile|strong="H3722"\w* \add withal\add* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*: it shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.
